description: This file provides a lightweight rule-based AI opponent and taunt generator for a Snakes and Ladders game, including functions for dice rolling, taunt selection, and AI turn computation.

methods.name: aiTakeTurn(aiCell, applyMove)
methods.description: Computes the AI's dice roll and resulting position after applying move logic.

The function generates a random number b.name: chooseTaunt
The function generates a random number b.description: Returns a taunt string based on the game context, including special cases for ladder, snake, win, and lead variations, as well as generic taunts.

parameters.ctx: Object containing game state info: aiCell, humanCell, lastRoll, movedTo, eventType

parameters.applyMove: Function that takes a roll number and returns an object with finalCell, intermediateCell, and eventType.
